item.description:
Join Us For
A Conscious Movie Benefiting Doctors without Borders
Saturday, June 26th at 7 p.m.

Enjoy movies? Enjoy discussing movies with others?
Join us for our Conscious Movie Night!

In June, see:


City of Joy

American doctor Max Lowe (Patrick Swayze) travels to Calcutta, India, to search for meaning in his life. His outlook is forever changed when he crosses paths with poverty-stricken Hasari, his family and Irish clinic volunteer Joan (Pauline Collins). Fighting deplorable living conditions and the local crime boss, Max and Joan team up to provide aid to the sick and dispossessed people of Calcutta in this drama.

All donations from the June Conscious Movie will be given to Doctors Without Borders.
________________________________________

If you have ever walked out of a movie theater affected by a powerful film, movie nights at the Center of Light are for you!

These events provide a way for people to talk about inspiring movies on a deeper level and how they affect our lives, our attitudes, our perceptions.

Itâ€™s also a great opportunity to meet like-minded people and support a worthy cause!

Boston.CentersOfLight.org

85 Edgell Road on the Framingham Common
(use the door on the left side of the house)
item.name: June Conscious Movie: City of Joy
